items.sentence: We had a very nice Christmas with Tom and his family.
We\'re still trying to convince Tom to go to college.
Let me read the paper when you have finished with it.
Mary pretended she was sick to avoid going to school.
My brother in Boston is studying to become a teacher.
He was wrong in thinking that she\'d come to see him.
Do you really think Tom\'s wounds are self-inflicted?
I wish Tom hadn\'t told Mary that I didn\'t like her.
Boston is just one of the cities I visited last year.
Can one person really make a difference in the world?
